text: He priya nabi! Muminadera yud'dhera jan'ya utsahita karo. Yadi tomadera madhye kurijana dhairyasila thake tabe tara duâ€™sa janake parajita karabe, ara yadi tomadera madhye ekasata jana thake tabe tara parajita karabe yara abisbasa posana kare tadera ekahajara janake, yehetu tara hacche ekati sampradaya yara bojhe na.
